name: Captain Usopp
description:
Description and lore

Captain Usopp is a 2D RPG action game focused on Usopp’s bizarre adventures through the sea, exploring different islands and fighting powerful enemies.

Usopp’s dream is being a brave warrior of the sea. To accomplish that, he is determined to explore the strangest locations and confront the most impressive creatures of his world.

Credits Programming and Design

  • https://mcreeper00.itch.io/
